divs: sighting detailsas i heard the car next door start i decided to look out my window and i saw a plane\jet then i saw it was diferrent than any other plane\jet i had ever seen the bright red light went from almost the front to back this might have been a blimp but can blimp go 250\300mph this realy seems odd i have obsreverd a wide variety of planes jets blimps day and nite i think this was some thing else also something i cant explane a feeling
Summary: thought it was a plane/jet then saw the entire side was a bright red light no plane has this kind of lights also the flashing lights seemed different
